msbt.message: Look at you, taking time out of your busy holiday schedule to send me such a thoughtful gift and card. Well, I hope you find my reply equally thoughtful, and my gift equally generous!
It would have been enough for you to simply send a nice letter. But you went above and beyond with such a thoughtful gift too! Well, I can't let myself be outdone like that, so I hope you enjoy this!
I was just thinking about you when your card and present arrived. What a nice surprise! Were you using telepathy, or what? If so, please teach me! Wait...what am I thinking about...right NOW?
Reading your note confirmed what I always assumed to be true—I have amazing taste in friends. If you ever doubt how great you are, just remember that you've met my incredibly high standards.

Hey, I just wanted to write back in appreciation for the note you sent me. I know it's busy at this time of year, so that's why it means that much more to send something personal like that. Thank you!

My holiday spirit went through the roof when I got your letter. I started thinking back to all the good times we've had... It's been something else, hasn't it? Well, here's hoping for another fab year!
